text:
Hani Shukrallah (‎; 1950 – 5 May 2019) was an Egyptian journalist and political analyst. He was editor-in-chief of "Al-Ahram Weekly" between 1991 and 2005. He was later founder and editor-in-chief of "Ahram Online". He also worked as a co-editor of "Al-Shorouk". He wrote articles for "Al-Hayat", "The Guardian", Indian magazine "Outlook" and the "Journal of Palestine Studies". He was born in Cairo.
Shukrallah died on 5 May 2019, at the age of 69.
